features.subtitle: An all-in-one learning platform for vibe coders

pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need to

0.question: What is vibe coding?
0.answer:
Vibe coding is building apps using AI coding tools (Claude Code, Cursor, Bolt, etc.) just by writing prompts. Say "build this feature" and AI generates the code.

The problem? You might not understand why your app works. VibeUniv fills that gap.

1.question: How do I connect my project with MCP?
1.answer:
MCP (Model Context Protocol) lets you automatically connect your project from your coding tool to VibeUniv.

Step 1: Get API Key

Sign up for VibeUniv, then go to Settings > API Keys to generate your key.

Step 2: Configure MCP Server

Add the vibeuniv server to your coding tool's MCP config file.

Step 3: Sync Your Project

Restart your coding tool and it connects automatically. Check your dashboard!

2.question: Which AI models are supported?
2.answer:
We support 11 LLM providers in total.

Anthropic (Claude), OpenAI (GPT), Google (Gemini), Groq, Mistral, DeepSeek, Cohere, Together AI, Fireworks AI, xAI (Grok), OpenRouter

On the Pro plan, you can use BYOK to register your own API keys.

3.question: Is the Free plan enough?
3.answer:
For learning 1-2 personal side projects, absolutely! It includes 3 projects, basic analysis, 1 roadmap/month, and 20 AI conversations/month.

If you need more projects or unlimited AI conversations, we recommend Pro ($19/mo).

4.question: Is my code kept safe?
4.answer:
Security is our top priority.

All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Sensitive files (.env, etc.) are automatically excluded, and LLM API keys are encrypted with AES-256-GCM. You can delete your data at any time.

5.question: What is BYOK (Bring Your Own Key)?
5.answer:
BYOK lets you register your own LLM API keys for use on the platform. Available on Pro plan and above.

Go to Settings > LLM Keys, select your provider, enter your API key, and start using it right away.
